full_text: Form approved. Budget Bureau No. 43-R079.7. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION (Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien reg- Mail or take to: istration receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Name WLADIMIR F LIVIN No. 10 001 331 APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION (See INSTRUCTIONS, page 5. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT.) I desire to file a petition for naturalization in the- Date: SUPREME Court at ALBANY NEW YORK (Name of Court) (City) (State) WLADIMIR F . LIVIN (Print or type your name) 22 FOREST DRIVE (Print or type apartment number, street address, and if appropriate "in care of") ALBANY 5, NEW YORK (City) (County) (State) (1) Was your father or mother ever a citizen of the United States Yes No. If "Yes" give full information (2) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? From- To- STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) 5-1 1956 date 19 72 forest Piene (b) 19 19 alley (c) , 19 19 (d) , 19 , 19 (e) 19 19 (3) What were the names, addresses, and occupations (or types of business) of your employers during the last 5 years RETIRED From- To EMPLOYER'S NAME ADDRESS OCCUPATION OR TYPE OF BUSINESS (a) , 19 19 (b) , 19 19 (c) , 19 , 19 (d) 19 19 (e) , 19 19 (4) Have you been out of the United States since you first arrived? Yes No. If "Yes" fill in the following informa- tion for every absence of less than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, Bus DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED To RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES 8 8 (5) How many times have you been married? / How many times has your husband or wife been married? / If either of you has been married more than once, fill in the following information for each previous marriage.
